# ECCTools

The `R` package `ECCTools` provides tools to modify and Energy Conversion Chain (ECC) 
that has been previously loaded using the `R` package `IEATools`. 
Particularly, it helps to prepare the formulation of Multi-Regional Physical Supply Use Tables (MR-PSUT)
representing the ECC, as well as to formulate Domestic Technology Assumption (DTA) formulations of national ECC.


## Installation

You can install `ECCTools` from github with:

```{r gh-installation, eval = FALSE}
# install devtools if not already installed
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("earamendia/ECCTools")
# To build vignettes locally, use
devtools::install_github("earamendia/ECCTools", build_vignettes = TRUE)
```


## History

The paper that demonstrates uses of this package is currently under review.
